                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 9</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>এক পারমাণবিক গ্যাসের ক্ষেত্রে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-1-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1" style="width: 0.71em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.561em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.678em, 1000.56em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.039em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.911em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>γ</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-1">\gamma</script></span> এর মান কত?</p>

                                        <br>

width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-45" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-46" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.846em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.68em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.859em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-47"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-48" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-49" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-50" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">32</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-51" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.85em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.846em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-52" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-53" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.617em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-54" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-55" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.62em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.617em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-56" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-57" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.42em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.3em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.145em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-58"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-59" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">194</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-60" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-61" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">32</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-62" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.42em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.42em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-63" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-64" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-65" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-66" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">90</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-67"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-68"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-69" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-70" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>32</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>194</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>32</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>90</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-8">\rm \frac{C}{5}=\frac{F-32}{9}\Rightarrow\frac{C}{5}=\frac{194-32}{9}\Rightarrow C=90°C</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-০৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            <p>পরাবৈদ্যুতিক ধ্রুবকের রাশিমালা কোনটি?&nbsp;</p>

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-9-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>&amp;#x03F5;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>&amp;#x03F5;</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-71" style="width: 3.782em;                                             </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-10-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03F5;</mi><msub><mi>&amp;#x03F5;</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-80" style="width: 3.782em; top: -3.641em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.271em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-86"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.594em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.914em; left: 0.276em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-88" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1000.73em, 1.186em, -999.998em);                                                 <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-16-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-124" style="width: 2.37em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-21-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03C6;</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-174" style="width: 3.117em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.543em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.5em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-175"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-176" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">φ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-177" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-178" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">E</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-179" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>φ</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-21">\rm \varphi=Es&nbsp;</script></span><br>
একক: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-22-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-180" style="width: 2.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.01em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1002.01em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-181"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-182" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-183"><span style="display: inline-block;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>220</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>1000</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>48.4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x03A9;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-258" style="width: 15.863em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.994em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.617em, 1012.95em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-259"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-260" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-261" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-262" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-263"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-264" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-265" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-266" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.95em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-267" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-268" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">R</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-269" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-270" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-271"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-272" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-273" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-274" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.95em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-275" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-276" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.051em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1001.93em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.588em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.941em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-277"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1001.56em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-278"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-279" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-280" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">220</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-281" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.342em; left: 1.6em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-282" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.39em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.695em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-283" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1000</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.05em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.051em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-284" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-285" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">48.4</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-286" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-287" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Ω</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>220</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>1000</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>48.4</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-34">\rm P=\frac{V^2}{R}\Rightarrow R=\frac{V^2}{P}=\frac{\left(220\right)^2}{1000}=48.4\ \Omega&nbsp;</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-১৯৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>প্রস্থচ্ছেদের ক্ষেত্রফল</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>পরিবাহীর উপাদান</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>তড়িৎ প্রবাহ</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-39-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>&amp;#x03C1;</mi><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-316" style="width: 3.527em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.871em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1002.87em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-317"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-318" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-319" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-320" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">ρ</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-321"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.21em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.08em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-322" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-323" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.66em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>ρ</mi><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-39">\rm R=\rho\frac{l}{A}</script></span>, এখানে, l = পরিবাহীর দৈর্ঘ্য,&nbsp;<br>
A =&nbsp;প্রস্থচ্ছেদের ক্ষেত্রফল, <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-40-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x3C1;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-324" style="width: 0.535em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.412em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1000.41em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-325"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-326"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-327"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-328" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ρ</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.903em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>ρ</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-40">ρ</script></span> = পরিবাহীর আপেক্ষিক রোধ।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-২৭৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-৪২৫]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-51-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>f</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.25</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-405" style="width: 14.264em; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-409" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.518em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-410" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1001.36em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.695em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-411"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-412" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">f<span style="display: inline-block; padding-left: 0.289em;">f<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-419" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-420" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-425" style="font-size: 70.7%; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.25</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-51">\rm P=\frac{1}{f\left(m\right)}\Rightarrow f=\frac{1}{p}=\frac{1}{4}=0.25\ m&nbsp;</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৬৫]</p>
</span>

                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 62</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি তরঙ্গের দুইটি বিন্দুর মধ্যবর্তী পথ পার্থক্য <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-52-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03BB;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-431" style="width: 0.747em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.598em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1000.56em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-432"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-433" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">λ</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.957em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>λ</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-52">\lambda</script></span> হলে বিন্দুদ্বয়ের দশা পার্থক্য কত?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>

                                </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-53-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-434" style="width: 1.368em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.095em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1001.1em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-435"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-436" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-437" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.947em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-53">4\pi </script></span></p>

                                            </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-54-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-438" style="width: 1.004em; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1000.55em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.549em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.447em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-54">\frac{\pi}{2} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-55-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-443" style="width: 1.368em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.095em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1001.1em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-444"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-445" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-446" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.947em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-55">2\pi </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-56-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-447" style="width: 1.004em; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-57-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B4;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mrow><mi>&amp;#x03BB;</mi></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B4;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mrow><mi>&amp;#x03BB;</mi></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03BB;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-452" style="width: 13.363em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.945em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1010.95em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-453"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-454" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">δ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-455" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-456" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.78em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-457"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-458" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-459" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-460" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">λ</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.86em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-461" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-462" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-463" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-464" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">δ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-465" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-466" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.78em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-467"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-468" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-469" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-470" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">λ</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.86em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-471" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-472" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">λ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-473" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-474" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-475" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>δ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mi>λ</mi></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>δ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mi>λ</mi></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mi>λ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-57">\rm \delta=\frac{2\pi}{\lambda}\times x\Rightarrow\delta=\frac{2\pi}{\lambda}\times\lambda=2\pi&nbsp;</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-৫৪৯]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>শূন্যস্থানে চৌম্বক প্রবেশ্যতার মান নিচের কোনটি?</p>

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-58-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-476" style="width: 9.52em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.789em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1007.79em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-477"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-478" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-479" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-480" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-481" style="padding-left: 0.23em;"><span style="display: inline-block;                                                 <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-66-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>9.1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>28</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-608" style="width: 7.47em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.104em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1006.1em, 2.598em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-609"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-610" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">9.1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-611" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-৬২১]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 72</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>সোডিয়ামের সূচন তরঙ্গদৈর্ঘ্য <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-67-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>6630</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x212B;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-623" style="width: 3.467em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.833em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.343em, 1002.83em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-624"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-625" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">6630</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-626" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-627"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-628"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-629"><span style="font-family: STIXGeneral, &quot;Arial Unicode MS&quot;, serif; font-size: 82%; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">Å</span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>6630</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>Å</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-67">\rm 6630 \ Å</script></span> হলে এর কার্য অপেক্ষক কত?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-72-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><msub><mi>&amp;#x03C5;</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></mrow><msub><mi>&amp;#x03BB;</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>6.63</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>32</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>8</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>6630</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>19</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-688" style="width: 20.166em;                                         <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>মহাকর্ষ বলের সাপেক্ষে তড়িৎ চৌম্বক বলের আপেক্ষিক সবলতা কত?</p>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-73-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>39</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-749" style="width: 2.188em;                                         <br>

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

                                        <br>

                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>1.8 দিন পর থাকবে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-90-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-860" style="width: 0.781em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.617em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.62em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-861"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-862"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-863" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-864" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-90">&nbsp;\frac{1}{2}</script></span> অংশ।<br>
3.6 দিন পর থাকবে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-91-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-865" style="width: 0.781em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.617em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.62em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-866"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-867"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-868" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-869" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-91">&nbsp;\frac{1}{4}</script></span> অংশ।<br>
∴ 5.4 দিন পর থাকবে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-92-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>8</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-870" style="width: 0.781em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.617em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.62em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-871"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-872"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-873" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-874" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">8</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>8</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-92">&nbsp;\frac{1}{8}</script></span> অংশ।<br>
∴ ক্ষয়প্রাপ্ত হবে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-93-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>8</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>7</mn><mn>8</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-875" style="width: 5.617em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.592em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1004.59em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-876"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-877" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-878" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-879" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-880" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-881" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-882" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">8</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-883" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-884" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-885" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-886" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">8</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>8</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>7</mn><mn>8</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-93">\rm =1-\frac{1}{8}=\frac{7}{8}</script></span> অংশ।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-৭১৯]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 89</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পরিবাহীর আপেক্ষিক রোধ কেমন?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-97-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>8</mn></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x03A9;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-902" style="width: 3.964em;                                     <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 93</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>সরলতম সংখ্যা পদ্ধতি নিচের কোনটি?&nbsp;</p>

padding-left: 0.276em;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-995" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-996" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.184em;">B</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-997" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.184em;">C</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.331em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.336em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>.</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-104">\rm A.(B+C)=A.B+A.C</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-৮২৭]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-107-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></msub></mrow><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>0.05</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>40</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1023" style="width: 11.477em;
