width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1050" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1051" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1052" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.23em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1053" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.05</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1054" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1055" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">40</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.047em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>∆</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></msub></mrow><mrow><mo>∆</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>0.05</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>40</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-107">\rm \beta= \left(\frac { ∆I_C}{∆I_B} \right)_{V_{CE}}=\frac {2}{0.05}=40  </script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-৮০৯]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 100</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কৃষ্ণ বিবর অঞ্চলের সীমাকে কী বলে?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 104</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-1-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>230</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2103;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1" style="width: 2.871em; font-size: 82%; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">℃</span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block;                                     <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>এখানে, <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-3-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>230</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>273</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>503</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-13" style="width: 11.928em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.756em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1009.72em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-14"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-15"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-16" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-17" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-18" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-19" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-20" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">230</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-21" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-22" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">273</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-23" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-24" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-25" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-26" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">503</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-27" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>230</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>273</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>503</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-3">\rm T_1=(230+273)K=503K</script></span><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-4-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>27</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>273</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>300</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-28" style="width: 11.395em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.346em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1009.3em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-29"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-30"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-31" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-32" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-33" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-34" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-5-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x3B7;</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>&amp;#xD7;</mo><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-43" style="width: 7.953em; [ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৩]</p>

clip: rect(3.372em, 1000.73em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -3.641em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.362em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-100" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">W</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1000.96em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.959em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.553em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.892em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>η</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-8">\rm η=\frac{Q_1}{W} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-9-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x3B7;</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>&amp;#xD7;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-101" style="width: 6.469em;                             <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 111</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো বস্তুর তাপমাত্রা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-11-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>40</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2103;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-123" style="width: 2.237em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.827em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.343em, 1001.83em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-124"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-125" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">40</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-126"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-127"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-128"><span style="font-family: STIXGeneral, &quot;Arial Unicode MS&quot;, serif; font-size: 82%; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">℃</span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>40</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>℃</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-11">\rm 40℃</script></span> হলে ফারেনহাইট স্কেলে&nbsp;উহার তাপমাত্রা কত হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>98</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-129" style="width: 1.869em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.505em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.37em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-130"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-131" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">98</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-132"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-133"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-134" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>98</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-12">\rm 98°</script></span></p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>এখানে, <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-16-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>40</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2103;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-153" style="width: 3.895em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.199em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1003.2em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-154"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-155" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-156" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-157" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">40</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-158"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-159"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-160"><span style="font-family: STIXGeneral, &quot;Arial Unicode MS&quot;, serif; font-size: 82%; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">℃</span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>40</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>℃</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-16">\rm C=40℃</script></span><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-17-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>32</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-161" style="width: 4.305em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.527em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.53em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-162"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-163"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.617em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-164" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-165" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.62em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.617em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-166" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-167" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.846em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.68em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.859em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-168"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-169" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-170" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-171" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">32</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-172" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.85em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.846em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>32</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-17">\rm \frac C5=\frac{F-32}{9}</script></span><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-18-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>9</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>160</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>360</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>160</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-173" style="width: 16.027em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.117em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1013.08em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-174"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-175" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-176" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">9</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-177" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-178" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-179" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-180" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-181" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-182" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">160</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-183" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-184" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">360</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-185" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-186" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-187" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-188" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-189" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">160</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>9</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>160</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>360</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>160</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-18">\rm \Rightarrow9C=5F-160\Rightarrow360=5F-160 </script></span><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-19-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>520</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>104</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-190" style="width: 10.412em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.527em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1008.49em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-191"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-192" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-193" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-194" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-195" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-196" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">520</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-197" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-198" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-199" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-200" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">104</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>520</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>104</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-19">\rm \Rightarrow5F=520\Rightarrow F=104</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 112</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোন শক্তি অন্য শক্তিতে সহজে রূপান্তরিত হতে চায় না?</p>

                                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-০৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

clip: rect(3.554em, 1000.32em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -3.777em; left: 0.276em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-245" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-246" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.32em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -3.641em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.18em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-247" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1001.23em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 1.232em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msubsup><mi>ϵ</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-23">\rm C=\frac{\epsilon_0^2A}{2}</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-১২৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-270" style="width: 12.051em; clip: rect(0.867em, 1000.46em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.458em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-419" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span style="display: inline-block; [ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-৮২]</p>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>9</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-421" style="width: 3.827em; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.96em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-426"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-427"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-428" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block;                                                 <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>40</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x3A9;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-499" style="width: 2.143em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.733em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1001.69em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-500"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-501" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">40</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-502"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-503"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-504" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Ω</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>40</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>Ω</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-45">\rm 40 Ω </script></span></p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-46-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>200</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>1000</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>40</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x03A9;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-505" style="width: 15.125em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.379em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.617em, 1012.34em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-506"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-507" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-508" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-509" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-510"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-511" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-512" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.95em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-514" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-515" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">R</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-516" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-517" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-518"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-519" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-520" style="font-size: 50%; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.95em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-522" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-523" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.051em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1001.56em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-525"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-526" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-527" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">200</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-528" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.342em; left: 1.6em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-529" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.39em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.695em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-530" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1000</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.05em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.051em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-531" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-532" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">40</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-533" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-534" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Ω</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>200</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>1000</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>40</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-46">\rm P=\frac{V^2}{R}\Rightarrow R=\frac{V^2}{P}=\frac{\left(200\right)^2}{1000}=40\ \Omega </script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৯৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-১৮৭]</p>
</span>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 136</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>DC বা সমপ্রবাহের ক্ষেত্রে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-59-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-637" style="width: 2.502em;                                             <p>পানির প্রতিসরাঙ্ক কত?&nbsp;</p>

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-60-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-644" style="width: 0.913em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-69-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>f</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>f</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-685" style="width: 15.125em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.379em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1012.38em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-686"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-687" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-688" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-689" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.518em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-690" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1001.36em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.695em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-691"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-692" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">f<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-693" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-694" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-695" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.52em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.518em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-696" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-697" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">f<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-698" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-699" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.617em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-700" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-701" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.62em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.617em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-702" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-703" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-704" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.86em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-705"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-706" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-707" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-708" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-709" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-710" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.5</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-711" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-712" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-69">\rm P=\frac{1}{f(m)}\Rightarrow f=\frac{1}{P}=\frac{1}{-2}=-0.5\ m </script></span></p>

<p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৬৫]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.32em, 4.146em, -999.998em); clip: rect(0.867em, 1000.87em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.867em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.669em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-75">\rm \frac{2\pi}{3} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-৫৪৯]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>শুন্যস্থানে তড়িৎ ভেদনযোগ্যতার মান নিচের কোনটি?&nbsp;</p>

position: absolute; top: -4.005em; left: 0.412em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.942em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.336em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>λ</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mrow></mfrac></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-88">\rm \lambda=\sqrt{\frac{m}{2eV}}</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-89-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03BB;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-949" style="width: 3.372em; padding-left: 0.23em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1016" style="padding-left: 0.23em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.414em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.96em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1017"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1018"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1019" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.415em; left: 1.004em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1020" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1021" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1022" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.225em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-97">\rm 1\times{10}^4\ m</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-৭১৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 185</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো তেজস্ক্রিয় মৌলের অর্ধায়ু 10 দিন। উক্ত মৌলের 75% ক্ষয় হতে কত সময় লাগবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>2 d</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>4 d</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>20 d</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>25 d</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: কোন তেজস্ক্রিয় মৌলের অর্ধায়ু T sec হলে nT sec পর মৌলটির <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-98-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msup><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi></msup></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1023" style="width: 1.068em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.86em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1024"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1025"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1026" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1027"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1028" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1029" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msup><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi></msup></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-98">\rm \frac{1}{2^n} </script></span> অংশ অবশিষ্ট থাকবে।<br>
অতএব, 25% বা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-99-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1030" style="width: 0.781em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1031"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1032"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-99">\rm \frac{1}{4}</script></span> অংশ বা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-100-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1035" style="width: 1.068em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1036"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1037"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-101-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1042" style="width: 6.928em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1043"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1044" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1045" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; [ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-৭২৭]</p>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 186</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-102-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msubsup><mi></mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>83</mn></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>210</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1052" style="width: 3.541em;                                         </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.99em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.727em; left: 0.248em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1155"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1156"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1157" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1158" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1159"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1160"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1161" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi></mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>83</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>210</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><msub><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>84</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>210</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><msubsup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>0</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>β</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-108">\rm _{83}Bi^{210}\rightarrow \ _{84}Po^{210}\rightarrow\ ^{\ \ \ 0}_{-1} β</script></span></p>

<p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-৭১৭]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 190</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোন গেইটটি AND এবং NOT গেইট দিয়ে তৈরি?&nbsp;</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-৭৯৯]</p>
