                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 199</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি&nbsp;ট্রানজিস্টরের ক্ষেত্রে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-113-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x3B1;</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.95</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1210" style="width: 4.547em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.728em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1003.69em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1211"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1212"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1213"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1214" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1215" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.911em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>α</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.95</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-113">\rm α=0.95</script></span> এবং <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-114-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1217" style="width: 6.746em;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-115-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></msub></mrow><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>0.95</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></msub></mrow><mn>1</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.95</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1227" style="width: 18.322em; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1240" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">I</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.248em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1241" style="font-size: 50%; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.27em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1252" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1256" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1257" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1258" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.95</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1259" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1260" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1261" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>∆</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></msub></mrow><mrow><mo>∆</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>0.95</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>∆</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></msub></mrow><mn>1</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mo>∆</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.95</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-115">\rm \alpha=\frac{∆I_C}{∆I_E}⇒0.95=\frac{∆I_C}{1}⇒∆I_C=0.95\ mA </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-116-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0.95</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.05</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1262" style="width: 20.945em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.174em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.314em, 1017.13em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1263"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1264" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1265" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">Δ</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1266"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1267" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">I</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1270" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">Δ</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1271"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1272" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">I</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1273" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1274" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1275" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">Δ</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1276"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1277" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">I</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1278" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1279" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1280" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1281" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1282" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1283" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0.95</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1284" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1285" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1286" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1287" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1288" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.05</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1289" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1290" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1291" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mo>∆</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>∆</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi></msub><mo>−</mo><mo>∆</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>0.95</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.05</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-116">\rm \therefore∆I_B=∆I_E-∆I_C=(1-0.95)mA=0.05\ mA </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-117-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></msub></mrow><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>0.95</mn><mn>0.05</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>19</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1292" style="width: 9.92em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.117em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1008.08em, 2.789em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1293"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1294" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1295" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1296" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1297" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.27em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1298"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1299" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">Δ</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1300"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1301" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">I</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.248em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1302" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.27em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1303"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1304" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">Δ</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1305"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1306" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">I</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.248em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1307" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1308" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1309" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.23em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1310" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.95</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.23em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1311" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.05</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1312" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1313" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">19</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>∆</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></msub></mrow><mrow><mo>∆</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>0.95</mn><mn>0.05</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>19</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-117">\rm \therefore\beta=\frac{∆I_C}{∆I_B}=\frac{0.95}{0.05}=19 </script></span></p>

<p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-৮০৯]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
